name: Dinner Hunter: Cook or Die
description:
HEY! So you wanna play our game! 

It's a little roguelike where you also have to cook ahah! 

Interesting isn't it? 

You've never cooked like that! 

Basic instructions:

Select your recipe with UP and DOWN arrow keys!

Space to select an ingredient (careful, you can't go back)!

Enter for validating the recipe! 

Move around the map with WASD :)

Use arrow keys for attack in 4 possible directions!

Your cookedex is visible by pushing the P key!

When you are in the kitchen , use F, G, H to give your respective recipe to the customers! 

Now you are ready to be a cook!

So good luck in your new job and have fun!
